steps.pc_to_ram: The value of the Program Counter is put on the address bus
steps.ram_to_ir: The instruction is loaded into the Instruction Register
steps.ir_to_cu: The opcode is sent to the Decoder
steps.cu_to_mux: The Control Unit sets wether the operand is direct or immediate
steps.cu_to_alu: The Control Unit sets the operation
steps.acc_to_alu1: The Accumulator is loaded in the ALU
steps.ir_to_alu2: The second operand is loaded from the Instruction Register
steps.ir_to_ram: The operand is put on the address bus
steps.memory_read: A memory read signal is sent to the RAM
steps.memory_fetch: A memory fetch signal is sent to the RAM
steps.memory_write: A memory write signal is sent to the RAM
steps.ram_to_alu2: The second operand is loaded from the RAM
steps.ir_to_pc: The Program Counter is set to the Instruction Register operand value
steps.acc_to_ram: The value of the Accumulator is put on the data bus
steps.acc_stored_to_ram: The value of the Accumulator is written into the RAM
